title: Fallen Blood
description: What mystery surrounds an abandoned house now owned by the Federal government, that would bring men dressed in black to a frightened teen's home in the middle of the night? That would have them drag her parents from their home? What would have them desperately searching for her, to keep whatever secret they hide. Her only hope is a lovesick teen with a secret of his own to hide.Vampire blood. Is it a curse, or is it a blessing? For two people in love, it's about to be a little of both.
author: Martin C. Sharlow
